api_list.name: Super Fast YouTube to MP3/MP4 Converter API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://super-fast-youtube-to-mp3-and-mp4-converter.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "super-fast-youtube-to-mp3-and-mp4-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
